subject: Dear Jena
body:
Dear Jena

Thanks for your response  to my proposal and your interest to work with me
.I am in receipt of your email. We shall be required to process and obtain
 the necessary legal and remittance documents  to reflect your name before
the Bank will remit the Funds to your account.

Please kindly reconfirm the following information by writing them out to
enable me commence the processing of the remittance documents.

YOUR FULL NAME AND ADDRESS

DIRECT TELEPHONE NUMBER

A COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION

A SAFE BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS WHERE THE FUNDS WILL DEPOSITED

I take this opportunity to assure you that the transaction will be
successfully completed as planned because of the concrete arrangement twe
have put in place for the execution of the transfer. Therefore, all I ask
of you is your full cooperation and honesty in the handling  of the fund
when it arrives in your account.

I await your response.

Thanks for your co operations.
Barrister James Adams
Telephone +2349022394977

subject: Re: Dear Jena
body:
Hello Barrister James Adams,

Thank you for your detailed response. I'm really excited about this opportunity and appreciate your guidance on the next steps.

However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of the process. Could you please explain more about these legal and remittance documents? What exactly are they and why do we need them?

Also, I'd like to understand better how this transfer will work. You mentioned that my name needs to be reflected before the bank can remit the funds to my account. Could you elaborate on this?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jena
